author: Moanwar
body: Adding the CNN models trained based on TICLv5 reconstruction information using a simple CNN-based approach. Two models were trained separately: one for trackster energy regression and one for particle ID, applied in different reconstruction stepsCLU3D (pattern recognition) and trackster linking. These models are saved in ONNX format for time optimization.
title: New ONNX models for PID and Energy Regression
